scripts.deploy:staging: gcloud config set project project-ego-staging-f9aae && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:staging:functions: cd functions && yarn build && yarn deploy:staging && cd ../
scripts.deploy:staging:firestore: firebase use staging && firebase functions:config:set env.value="staging" && firebase deploy --only firestore && firebase functions:config:unset env
scripts.deploy:staging:all: yarn deploy:staging && yarn deploy:staging:functions && yarn deploy:staging:firestore
scripts.deploy:staging:rules: firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules,storage
scripts.deploy:staging:indexes: firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only firestore:indexes
scripts.deploy:production:job: gcloud config set project habittt-b66b4 && gcloud beta scheduler jobs create http alert-todo --schedule="0 0-23 * * *" --uri="https://asia-northeast1-habittt-b66b4.cloudfunctions.net/api-alertOnRequest" --description="api-alertOnRequestを一時間ごとに定期実行する" --http-method="get" --time-zone="Asia/Tokyo"
